SorcererSpells.Name: Burning Hands
SorcererSpells.Description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips.

SorcererSpells.Name: Charm Person
SorcererSpells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Color Spray
SorcererSpells.Description: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand.

SorcererSpells.Name: Comprehend Languages
SorcererSpells.Description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear.

SorcererSpells.Name: Detect Magic
SorcererSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

SorcererSpells.Name: Disguise Self
SorcererSpells.Description: You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different.

SorcererSpells.Name: Expeditious Retreat
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace.

SorcererSpells.Name: False Life
SorcererSpells.Description: You bolster yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life.

SorcererSpells.Name: Feather Fall
SorcererSpells.Description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Fog Cloud
SorcererSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Jump
SorcererSpells.Description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

SorcererSpells.Name: Mage Armor
SorcererSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends.

SorcererSpells.Name: Magic Missile
SorcererSpells.Description: You create three glowing darts of magical force.

SorcererSpells.Name: Shield
SorcererSpells.Description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you.

SorcererSpells.Name: Silent Image
SorcererSpells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 15-foot cube.

SorcererSpells.Name: Sleep
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber.

SorcererSpells.Name: Thunderwave
SorcererSpells.Description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you.

SorcererSpells.Name: Alter Self
SorcererSpells.Description: You assume a different form.

SorcererSpells.Name: Blindness/Deafness
SorcererSpells.Description: You can blind or deafen a foe.

SorcererSpells.Name: Blur
SorcererSpells.Description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you.

SorcererSpells.Name: Darkness
SorcererSpells.Description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Darkvision
SorcererSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark.

SorcererSpells.Name: Detect Thoughts
SorcererSpells.Description: You gain insight into the thinking of one creature.

SorcererSpells.Name: Enhance Ability
SorcererSpells.Description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement.

SorcererSpells.Name: Enlarge/Reduce
SorcererSpells.Description: You cause a creature or object you can see within range to grow larger or smaller for the duration.

SorcererSpells.Name: Gust of Wind
SorcererSpells.Description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose.

SorcererSpells.Name: Hold Person
SorcererSpells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

SorcererSpells.Name: Invisibility
SorcererSpells.Description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

SorcererSpells.Name: Knock
SorcererSpells.Description: Choose an object that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Levitate
SorcererSpells.Description: One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically, up to 20 feet, and remains suspended there.

SorcererSpells.Name: Mirror Image
SorcererSpells.Description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space.

SorcererSpells.Name: Misty Step
SorcererSpells.Description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

SorcererSpells.Name: Scorching Ray
SorcererSpells.Description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: See Invisibility
SorcererSpells.Description: For the duration, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible.

SorcererSpells.Name: Shatter
SorcererSpells.Description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Spider Climb
SorcererSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free.

SorcererSpells.Name: Suggestion
SorcererSpells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

SorcererSpells.Name: Web
SorcererSpells.Description: You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point of your choice within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Blink
SorcererSpells.Description: Roll a d20 at the end of each of your turns for the duration of the spell.

SorcererSpells.Name: Clairvoyance
SorcererSpells.Description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you.

SorcererSpells.Name: Counterspell
SorcererSpells.Description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell.

SorcererSpells.Name: Daylight
SorcererSpells.Description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
SorcererSpells.Description: Choose any creature, object, or magical effect within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Fear
SorcererSpells.Description: You project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears.

SorcererSpells.Name: Fireball
SorcererSpells.Description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Fly
SorcererSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature.

SorcererSpells.Name: Gaseous Form
SorcererSpells.Description: You transform a willing creature you touch, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration.

SorcererSpells.Name: Haste
SorcererSpells.Description: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Hypnotic Pattern
SorcererSpells.Description: You create a twisting pattern of colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Lightning Bolt
SorcererSpells.Description: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose.

SorcererSpells.Name: Major Image
SorcererSpells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube.

SorcererSpells.Name: Protection from Energy
SorcererSpells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

SorcererSpells.Name: Sleet Storm
SorcererSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, freezing rain and sleet fall in a 20-foot-tall cylinder with a 40-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Slow
SorcererSpells.Description: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Stinking Cloud
SorcererSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of yellow, nauseating gas centered on a point within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Tongues
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

SorcererSpells.Name: Water Breathing
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell gives a maximum of ten willing creatures within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends.

SorcererSpells.Name: Water Walk
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface—such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were harmless solid ground.

SorcererSpells.Name: Banishment
SorcererSpells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.

SorcererSpells.Name: Blight
SorcererSpells.Description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it.

SorcererSpells.Name: Confusion
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell assaults and twists creatures' minds, spawning delusions and provoking uncontrolled actions.

SorcererSpells.Name: Dimension Door
SorcererSpells.Description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Dominate Beast
SorcererSpells.Description: You attempt to beguile a beast that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Greater Invisibility
SorcererSpells.Description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

SorcererSpells.Name: Ice Storm
SorcererSpells.Description: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Polymorph
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form.

SorcererSpells.Name: Stoneskin
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone.

SorcererSpells.Name: Wall of Fire
SorcererSpells.Description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Animate Objects
SorcererSpells.Description: Objects come to life at your command.

SorcererSpells.Name: Cloudkill
SorcererSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of poisonous, yellow-green fog centered on a point you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Cone of Cold
SorcererSpells.Description: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands.

SorcererSpells.Name: Creation
SorcererSpells.Description: You pull wisps of shadow material from the Shadowfell to create a nonliving object of vegetable matter within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Dominate Person
SorcererSpells.Description: You attempt to beguile a humanoid that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Hold Monster
SorcererSpells.Description: Choose a creature that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Insect Plague
SorcererSpells.Description: Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Seeming
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell allows you to change the appearance of any number of creatures that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Telekinesis
SorcererSpells.Description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought.

SorcererSpells.Name: Teleportation Circle
SorcererSpells.Description: As you cast the spell, you draw a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground inscribed with sigils that link your location to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice whose sigil sequence you know.

SorcererSpells.Name: Wall of Stone
SorcererSpells.Description: A nonmagical wall of solid stone springs into existence at a point you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Chain Lightning
SorcererSpells.Description: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Circle of Death
SorcererSpells.Description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot-radius sphere from a point within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Disintegrate
SorcererSpells.Description: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger to a target that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Eyebite
SorcererSpells.Description: For the spell's duration, your eyes become an inky void imbued with dread power.

SorcererSpells.Name: Globe of Invulnerability
SorcererSpells.Description: An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot radius around you.

SorcererSpells.Name: Mass Suggestion
SorcererSpells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you.

SorcererSpells.Name: Move Earth
SorcererSpells.Description: Choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Sunbeam
SorcererSpells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-line.

SorcererSpells.Name: True Seeing
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.

SorcererSpells.Name: Delayed Blast Fireball
SorcererSpells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-line.

SorcererSpells.Name: Etherealness
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.

SorcererSpells.Name: Finger of Death
SorcererSpells.Description: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain.

SorcererSpells.Name: Fire Storm
SorcererSpells.Description: A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Plane Shift
SorcererSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

SorcererSpells.Name: Prismatic Spray
SorcererSpells.Description: Eight multicolored rays of light flash from your hand.

SorcererSpells.Name: Reverse Gravity
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell reverses gravity in a 50-foot-radius, 100-foot high cylinder centered on a point within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Teleport
SorcererSpells.Description: This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures of your choice that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Dominate Monster
SorcererSpells.Description: You attempt to beguile a creature that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Earthquake
SorcererSpells.Description: You create a seismic disturbance at a point on the ground that you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Incendiary Cloud
SorcererSpells.Description: A swirling cloud of smoke shot through with white-hot embers appears in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Power Word Stun
SorcererSpells.Description: You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range, leaving it dumbfounded.

SorcererSpells.Name: Sunburst
SorcererSpells.Description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Gate
SorcererSpells.Description: You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different plane of existence.

SorcererSpells.Name: Meteor Swarm
SorcererSpells.Description: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range.

SorcererSpells.Name: Power Word Kill
SorcererSpells.Description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to die instantly.

SorcererSpells.Name: Time Stop
SorcererSpells.Description: You briefly stop the flow of time for everyone but yourself.

SorcererSpells.Name: Wish
SorcererSpells.Description: Desire is the most powerful spell a mortal creature can cast.
